title: Looking for members for an all girls 5's team ^_^
body:
Not a serious team just looking for other girls to form a nice little community <3 Add me in game or respond below if you want to join- DiddlyDonger 
No rank requirements!

replies.body: pics plz
pics of wat?

not bad. needs bigger boobs though

> [{quoted}](name=Katsui,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=zQjv1UWB,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-08-14T07:49:13.707+0000)

Question: Why no boys?

> [{quoted}](name=Zen Bot,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=zQjv1UWB,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-08-13T23:24:04.656+0000)
>
> Question: Why no boys?

Because It's nice to be able to form a community with other girls who play league. I've only ever been on ranked teams with other boys so I thought an all girls team would be nice for a change.
weow gender equality people. OP so sexist.
